title.native: Fate/Grand Order コミックアラカルト
title.romaji: Fate/Grand Order: Comic à la Carte

description:
An anthology comic of Fate/Grand Order by various mangaka.

Volume 1 (2016/3/8)
#Cover illustration: Shima Shinoji (志麻しのじ)
#Color illustrations: Aono Sumio, Ohitashi Netsurou (おひたし熱郎), Arkray (アークレイ)
1. Master Pickup Kunren (マスターピックアップ訓練) [Osaka Tama] (逢坂たま)
2. Toaru Shugosha no Tatakai (とある守護者の戦い) [Suuichi] (スーイチ)
3. Fuyu no Mamono Drive (冬の魔物ドライブ) [Nekotawawa] (ネコタワワ)
4. Jinri Hoshou Kikan Chaldea (Wara) (人理保障機関カルデア（笑）)[Takashiro] (タカシロ)
5. Kijou-kei Girl: Netsukawa★Coordinate (騎乗系ガール 熱カワ★コーデ) [Namino Ryou]
6. Totsugeki! Uwasa no My Room (とつげき! 噂のマイルーム) [Mata] (また)
7. Uogokoro Areba Mizugokoro (魚心あれば水心) [Sakura Tasuke]
8. Nou☆Nou☆Training (脳☆脳☆トレイニング)[Makoto] (まこと)
9. Suki/Kirai Jijou (好き/嫌い事情) [Minami Funi.] (南ふに。)
10. Flags (Flags) [Hazumi Nariyuki]
11. Ryuu no Majo (Shokyuu) (竜の魔女【初級】) [Kurohachi] (黒八)
12. Nero wo Dame ni Suru Kotatsu (ネロをだめにするこたつ) [Usagi Routo]

Volume 2 (2016/5/21)
#Cover illustration: nokcy
#Color illustrations: Sakizo, Soga Makoto, Usagi Routo
1. Ulster Pickup (アルスターピックアップ) [Aono Sumio]
2. Golden Bouya (ゴールデン坊や) [Makoto] (まこと)
3. Koutei-sama no Shuchou (皇帝サマの主張) [Abogado] (あぼがど)
4. Caesar no Servant Sou-Katsuyaku Shakai (カエサルのサーヴァント総活躍社会) [Poppoyaki-ya] (ぽっぽ焼き屋)
5. Horse & Meet (ほーす&みーと) [Namonashi]
6. Tatoeba Konna Altera-san (たとえばこんなアルテラさん) [Comaku]
7. Totsugeki! Enjou Mansion Ogawa (突撃! 炎上マンション小川) [Ohitashi Netsurou] (おひたし熱郎)
8. Matsuri da Obake da Zenin Shuugou!! (祭だお化けだ全員集合!!) [Mashin Eiichirou]
9. Holiday Quest (ホリデークエスト) [Fue]
10. Iza Ikan! Chaldea Mimawari (いざ行かん! カルデア見廻り) [Somemiya Suzume]
11. Dr. Roman, Hekotareru. (Dr.ロマン、へこたれる) [Kinuta Kouji] (絹田コウジ)
12. Altria Kaigi (アルトリア会議) [Nakatani] (中谷)
13. Master to Eirei wa Tottemo Nakayoshi! (マスターと英霊はとっても仲良し!) [Osaka Tama] (逢坂たま)
14. Honjitsu, Salad Kaigi (本日、サラダ会議) [Nekotawawa] (ネコタワワ)
15. No Title (No title) [Aogu] (あおぐ)

Volume 3 (2016/8/23)

1. Shiritsu☆Chaldea Gakuen (私立☆カルデア学園) [Usagi Routo]

name.native: レオナルド・ダ・ヴィンチ

node.description:
**Gender:** Male
**Date of Birth:** July 16
**Current Residence:** Chiba Prefecture, Japan
**Doujin Circle:** Ronpaia

[Website](http://rhomphair.svpf.ws/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/fue_sirikageru) | [Pixiv](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=357233)

__Headquarters:__ Tokyo, Japan

__[Website](http://typemoon.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tmitterofficial)__

__Introduction:__
Type-Moon is a Japanese game company was founded by artist [Takashi Takeuchi](https://anilist.co/staff/99054/Takashi-Takeuchi) and writer [Kinoko Nasu](https://anilist.co/staff/98250/Kinoko-Nasu), who were also schoolmates. The names "TYPE-MOON" and "Notes." come from one of their early works, Notes..

__History:__
Originally formed as a Doujin Soft in 2000 and created the popular visual novel Tsukihime, but turned into a Commercial Organization on January 30, 2004 and in the same year, they released their PC-based eroge visual novel game Fate/stay night, which is their most well known title.
